tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**CellProfiler Pipeline**
This tool will run one of the 6 cellprofiler pipeline's aqcuired from OHSU.
*Brenden Colson Center*: Evaluate # of nuclei appearing within enlarged ducts.
*Gray Lab*: High Throughput Imaging
*Corless Lab*: Tumor Prevalence Estimation
*Yantasee Lab*: Compares Her2+ Cells vs Total Cells
*Yantasee Lab*: Quantify percentage of image occupied by blood vessels
*Tsujikawa Lab*: Provides flow cytometry data for aligned images; Differentiates immune cells against cancer cells
